introduction: Hey! I'm a computer engineer who will be graduating from UC San Diego in June 2021. I am an efficient and organized full stack developer and I've interned at a couple places working on machine learning pipelines. I'm especially interested in how to integrate machine learning into IoT devices or general hardware integration. I'm open to freelance work in web, APIs, or database development for your business! Just email me @ jamesimcdougalljr@gmail.com
